p: The isolated compound 349 was evaluated for antifungal activities against C. neoformans and P. marneffei, it displayed weak antifungal activity against C. neoformans with MIC value of 32 μg/mL. Amphotericin B was used as positive control for fungi, displayed the MIC values of 1.0 μg/mL and 2.0 μg/mL against C. neoformans and P. marneffei [ 63].
